name: Pulse Of The Living World
effect: The mage gains the Mage Sight. He is able to detect the presence of mystic vital animation in the area, effectively reading resonance as a function of reality's living energies. See the information on Resonance for rules on scrutinizing magic with this spell.

rotes.roteDescription: The very first anthroposophical exercise involves meditating on the force of energy within a living plant. The mage needs to find a place of silence and contemplates a living plant, observing its every contour and purpose with the utmost care, gradually becoming aware of the green force within it. Having reached a point of enlightenment through observation, the mage understands life that much better for a while.
